metadata.title: CVE-2020-15653 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An iframe sandbox element with the allow-popups flag could be bypassed whenusing noopener links. This could have led to security issues for websitesrelying on sandbox configurations that allowed popups and hosted arbitrarycontent. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 78.1, Firefox < 79, andThunderbird < 78.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
